thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Tower Bridge Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A good hotel
thread.title_full: A good hotel - Review of Premier Inn London Tower Bridge Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Woodsider N
title: A good hotel
text:
Typically another good hotel from Premiere Inn.
Fairly well located for London. Although the children did grumble about the 10/15 minute walk to the tube station (London Bridge). But it's not that bad
There is a restaurant attached (Thyme) which looked to do the typical lunches/evening meals. This is where they served the breakfast. As always our son loves the all inclusive breakfast.
Would recommend getting to breakfast either early or late as when we came out from eating (9:30/10:00ish) people were queuing to get in.
There is a Papa Johns pizza place across the road and a mini Co-op shop which is handy for those mini supplies.
Luggage storage was absolutely no problem.
The room was very warm. We ended up turning the AC off and opening a window.
Although we didn't use it, there is a car park adjacent the hotel. Roughly £15 for the night. Don't forget your congestion zone payment (£10/11?).
